task.title: Obtaining a report of the meeting
task.shortdesc: You can obtain a summary or detailed report for meetings that you own.

context.p: This feature is available, if the Sametime administrator has enabled the report policy. If not, the feature is not available in the user interface.
The Summary and Full reports are available after the meeting ends. For information about what these reports contain, see .

step.cmd: From the menu, tap Meeting and then tap the Recent tab.
Next to the meeting to view reports for, click the menu icon () for that meeting.
Select Meeting reports and then select the type of report to view.
step.info: The report opens in a new window as a PDF and is downloaded onto your device. The name of the report is meeting_name_ date_report_type_number.

step.cmd: Close the window to close the report.
